p: Methods: Retrospective-prospective observational study in a university hospital. CRRT with RCA-CVVHD (30Â ml/kg/h). PO4 substitution via a separate infusion (PO4-I; retrospective data); use of a PO4-containing dialysate (CiCa dialysate K4, Fres. Medical Care)(PO4-D, prospective data). Primary outcome: incidence of severe hypoPO4. Secondary outcome: maintenance of normal PO4-levels, duration of mechan. ventilation and length stay in the ICU (with approval of local ethics committee, NCT01946113).
